ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectCertificates of Public Convenience and Necessity OC-44 and GC-39
PrecisOrder to issue Amending Orders AO-003-OC-44 and AO-002-GC-39 to vary the CERTIFICATES OF PUBLIC CONVENIENCE AND NECESSITY OC-44 and GC-39 to reflect the change in name to Pembina Resource Services GP Inc.
